channel.title: AWS on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on mostlymaths.net

item.title: 2020#14 Readings
item.description: This past week has been Data+AI Summit, so there are several new product announcements from Databricks.

item.title: UTF-8 Issues between AWS Redshift and Apache Spark when COPY PARQUET
item.description: Timezones and UTF are rocks you repeatedly hit in your data journey.

item.title: Configuring log4j properties in Databricks (and EMR)
item.description: Managing logging in Spark ain’t easy, and is even harder in managed clouds like Databricks or EMR.

item.title: Find-the-gap with SQL in AWS Redshift
item.description: A relatively common type of query for time-based SQL tables is a find the gap query. How can you do this in AWS Redshift, which does not have the SQL function generate_series?

item.title: 2020#58 Readings
item.description: I have read quite a bit this week, I’m also preparing a summary of the RDD paper.
